channel.title: Program thing Request
channel.description:
(I am not sure if this is the right place to post this theard)
Hi im triyng to fix this for my friend... he are going to use it to some sort of a project. Can somebody teach me how i can make the program, so if u open it this comes up:
[IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/1197/dblirb.jpg[/img]
But as you see its only a picture now, so can somebody help me make it a program and so that you can write in the box's that says username and password. And how can I make so when you click the "log in" you dont log in the text in the boxes get sendt to an email im going to decide.
